text: Por ella soy Eva (International Title: Me, Her and Eva!, Literal Translation: For Her, I'm EvaSuperstars Lucero and Jaime Camil Return to Univision in a Hilariously Endearing Love Story with a Twist – “Por Ella Soy Eva”) is a Mexican soap opera produced by Rosy Ocampo for Televisa based on the Colombian soap opera En los tacones de Jorge.''' ==Episodes== {| border="2" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" align="center" !
